data.message:
Good evening, I am Daniel I am very Eminem fan and never had the opportunity to go on a show here in Brazil.
Day 12 March 2016 will have the opportunity , as will the Lollapalooza Brazil , SP . And I would already begging to meet my idol EMINEM .

I do not speak English, but singing all the songs, I follow since 2003 when I watched the movie "8 Mile"

I know there are many fans, but I believe that is will be my only chance , because my parents are elderly, take care of them , I can not travel and follow my idol . Moreover I am to marry , expenses are high, open up many things to get going at least on a show .

If I die today , I'm already happy, knowing that I am with the tickets and the ticket purchased the show, even better if someone from production feasible this meeting .

Thank you very much in advance!

"I'm not afraid"
